abstract.text: Noticing patterns to better protect myself.

inlineContent.text: I’m getting to a place where I don’t care about being patient with certain behaviors. I’m not sure what all those behaviors are yet. I’m not sure what the “right” limits for my patience are either. The problem I’m finding is that certain personality types take advantage of that patience and keep pushing its limits. I think I need to treat those people differently and set firm limits.

abstract.text: David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
